001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.view;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.graphics.Canvas;
005import android.graphics.Color;
006import android.graphics.Paint;
007import android.graphics.Paint.Style;
008import android.graphics.drawable.Drawable;
009import android.util.AttributeSet;
010import android.view.MotionEvent;
011import android.view.View;
012import android.view.View.OnTouchListener;
013import android.view.ViewConfiguration;
014import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
015import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
016import androidx.appcompat.content.res.AppCompatResources;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.R;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Board;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Ship;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Shot;
021
022/**
023 * This view class extends the View class and implements OnTouchListener. This class handles
024 * everything that happens on the board. It holds all the drawables for the board itself, the ships,
025 * and the shots, as well as the methods to draw them on the board.
026 */
027public class BoardView extends View implements OnTouchListener {
028
029  private static final long LONG_CLICK_DURATION = ViewConfiguration.getLongPressTimeout();
030  private static final int MAX_CLICK_RADIUS = 15;
031  private static final int SHIP_DRAWING_INSET = 10;
032
033  private Board board;
034  private int size;
035  private boolean[][] shots;
036  private Paint gridPaint;
037  private Paint shipPaint;
038  private Paint selectedShipPaint;
039  private Paint pendingShotPaint;
040  private float downX;
041  private float downY;
042  private long downTime;
043  private OnClickListener clickListener;
044  private OnLongClickListener longClickListener;
045  private float cellWidth;
046  private float cellHeight;
047  private Drawable smallShip;
048  private Drawable mediumShip;
049  private Drawable largeShip;
050//  private Drawable rotatedSmallShip;
051//  private Drawable rotatedMediumShip;
052//  private Drawable rotatedLargeShip;
053  private Drawable hit;
054  private Drawable miss;
055
056  {
057    gridPaint = new Paint();
058    gridPaint.setColor(Color.GRAY);
059    gridPaint.setStrokeWidth(2);
060    shipPaint = new Paint();
061    shipPaint.setColor(Color.MAGENTA);
062    shipPaint.setStyle(Style.FILL);
063    selectedShipPaint = new Paint();
064    selectedShipPaint.setColor(Color.BLACK);
065    selectedShipPaint.setStyle(Style.STROKE);
066    selectedShipPaint.setStrokeWidth(8);
067    pendingShotPaint = new Paint();
068    pendingShotPaint.setColor(Color.RED);
069    pendingShotPaint.setStyle(Style.FILL);
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * A constructor for the BoardView.
074   *
075   * @param context Context
076   */
077  public BoardView(Context context) {
078    super(context);
079    loadResources(context);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Another constructor, with an extra parameter.
084   *
085   * @param context Context.
086   * @param attrs   AttributeSet.
087   */
088  public BoardView(Context context, @Nullable AttributeSet attrs) {
089    super(context, attrs);
090    loadResources(context);
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Another constructor, this one implementing more parameters.
095   *
096   * @param context      Context.
097   * @param attrs        AttributeSet.
098   * @param defStyleAttr int.
099   */
100  public BoardView(Context context, @Nullable AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr) {
101    super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr);
102    loadResources(context);
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * A fourth constructor, this one with one additional parameter.
107   *
108   * @param context      Context.
109   * @param attrs        AttributeSet.
110   * @param defStyleAttr int.
111   * @param defStyleRes  int.
112   */
113  public BoardView(Context context, @Nullable AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr,
114      int defStyleRes) {
115    super(context, attrs, defStyleAttr, defStyleRes);
116    loadResources(context);
117  }
118
119  @Override
120  protected void onMeasure(int widthMeasureSpec, int heightMeasureSpec) {
121    int width = getSuggestedMinimumWidth();
122    int height = getSuggestedMinimumHeight();
123    width =
124        resolveSizeAndState(getPaddingLeft() + getPaddingRight() + width, widthMeasureSpec, 0);
125    height =
126        resolveSizeAndState(getPaddingTop() + getPaddingBottom() + height, heightMeasureSpec, 0);
127    int size = Math.min(width, height);
128    setMeasuredDimension(size, size);
129    cellWidth = (float) width / this.size;
130    cellHeight = (float) height / this.size;
131  }
132
133  @Override
134  protected void onDraw(@NonNull Canvas canvas) {
135    super.onDraw(canvas);
136    update();
137    if (board != null && size > 0) {
138      Context context = getContext();
139      loadResources(context);
140      drawGrid(canvas);
141      if (board.isMine()) {
142        drawShips(canvas);
143      }
144      drawShots(canvas);
145      drawPendingShots(canvas);
146    }
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Sets the board for a game.
151   *
152   * @param board Board.
153   */
154  public void setBoard(Board board) {
155    this.board = board;
156    update();
157  }
158
159  /**
160   * Sets the boardSize.
161   *
162   * @param size int.
163   */
164  public void setSize(int size) {
165    this.size = size;
166    update();
167  }
168
169  /**
170   * Sets the shots on a board.
171   *
172   * @param shots boolean[][]
173   */
174  public void setShots(boolean[][] shots) {
175    this.shots = shots;
176  }
177
178  private void update() {
179    if (size > 0) {
180      float width = getWidth();
181      float height = getHeight();
182      cellWidth = width / size;
183      cellHeight = height / size;
184      postInvalidate();
185      setOnTouchListener(this);
186    }
187  }
188
189  /**
190   * Sets the long click listener used to get the pop-up menu for moving ships.
191   *
192   * @param longClickListener onLongClickListener.
193   */
194  public void setLongClickListener(
195      OnLongClickListener longClickListener) {
196    this.longClickListener = longClickListener;
197  }
198
199  /**
200   * Sets the click listener used to place and toggle shots.
201   *
202   * @param clickListener OnClickListener.
203   */
204  public void setClickListener(OnClickListener clickListener) {
205    this.clickListener = clickListener;
206  }
207
208  private boolean isCloseEnough(MotionEvent event) {
209    return Math.hypot(event.getX() - downX, event.getY() - downY) < MAX_CLICK_RADIUS;
210  }
211
212  private void drawGrid(Canvas canvas) {
213    float width = getWidth();
214    float height = getHeight();
215    for (int lineIndex = 0; lineIndex <= size; lineIndex++) {
216      canvas.drawLine(0, lineIndex * cellHeight, width, lineIndex * cellHeight, gridPaint);
217      canvas.drawLine(lineIndex * cellWidth, 0, lineIndex * cellWidth, height, gridPaint);
218    }
219  }
220
221  private void drawShips(Canvas canvas) {
222    for (Ship ship : board.getShips()) {
223      int x = ship.getX();
224      float left = (x - 1) * cellWidth;
225      int y = ship.getY();
226      float top = (y - 1) * cellHeight;
227      float right;
228      float bottom;
229      boolean vertical = ship.isVertical();
230      int length = ship.getLength();
231      if (vertical) {
232        right = x * cellWidth;
233        bottom = (y - 1 + length) * cellHeight;
234      } else {
235        right = (x - 1 + length) * cellWidth;
236        bottom = y * cellHeight;
237      }
238//      right -= 20;
239//      bottom -= 20;
240//      canvas.drawRoundRect(left + DRAWING_INSET, top + DRAWING_INSET, right - DRAWING_INSET, bottom - DRAWING_INSET, DRAWING_INSET, DRAWING_INSET, shipPaint);
241      if (ship.isSelected()) {
242        canvas.drawRoundRect(left, top, right, bottom, 0, 0, selectedShipPaint);
243      }
244      Drawable shipDrawable = switch (ship.getLength()) {
245        case 2 -> smallShip;
246        case 3 -> mediumShip;
247        case 4 -> largeShip;
248        default -> null;
249      };
250
251      //noinspection DataFlowIssue
252      shipDrawable.setBounds((int) left + SHIP_DRAWING_INSET, (int) top + SHIP_DRAWING_INSET, (int) right - SHIP_DRAWING_INSET, (int) bottom - SHIP_DRAWING_INSET);
253      shipDrawable.draw(canvas);
254    }
255
256  }
257
258  private void drawShots(Canvas canvas) {
259    for (Shot shot : board.getShots()) {
260      int x = shot.getX();
261      float left = (x - 1) * cellWidth;
262      int y = shot.getY();
263      float top = (y - 1) * cellHeight;
264      float right = left + cellWidth;
265      float bottom = top + cellHeight;
266      Drawable shotDrawable = shot.isHit() ? hit : miss;
267      shotDrawable.setBounds((int) left + SHIP_DRAWING_INSET,(int) top + SHIP_DRAWING_INSET,(int) right - SHIP_DRAWING_INSET,(int) bottom - SHIP_DRAWING_INSET);
268     shotDrawable.draw(canvas);
269    }
270  }
271
272  private void drawPendingShots(Canvas canvas) {
273    if (shots != null) {
274      for (int rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < shots.length; rowIndex++) {
275        for (int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < shots[rowIndex].length; columnIndex++) {
276          float centerY = (rowIndex + 0.5F) * cellHeight;
277          if (shots[rowIndex][columnIndex]) {
278            float centerX = (columnIndex + 0.5F) * cellWidth;
279            canvas.drawCircle(centerX, centerY, cellWidth * 0.4F, pendingShotPaint);
280          }
281        }
282      }
283    }
284  }
285
286  private void loadResources(Context context) {
287    smallShip = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.canoe);
288    mediumShip = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.galley);
289    largeShip = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.trireme);
290//    rotatedSmallShip = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.rotated_canoe);
291//    rotatedMediumShip = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.rotated_galley);
292//    rotatedLargeShip = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.rotated_trireme);
293    hit = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.hit);
294    miss = AppCompatResources.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.miss);
295  }
296
297  private Ship shipAt(int gridX, int gridY) {
298    if (board.isMine()) {
299      return board.getShips()
300          .stream()
301          .filter((ship) -> ship.includesPoint(gridX, gridY))
302          .findFirst()
303          .orElse(null);
304    } else {
305      return null;
306    }
307  }
308
309  @Override
310  public boolean onTouch(View v, MotionEvent event) {
311    boolean handled = false;
312    if (event.getAction() == MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN) {
313      downX = event.getX();
314      downY = event.getY();
315      downTime = event.getEventTime();
316      handled = true;
317    } else if (event.getAction() == MotionEvent.ACTION_UP && isCloseEnough(event)) {
318      long duration = event.getEventTime() - downTime;
319      int gridX = (int) (downX / cellWidth) + 1;
320      int gridY = (int) (downY / cellHeight) + 1;
321      Ship ship = shipAt(gridX, gridY);
322      if (duration < LONG_CLICK_DURATION) {
323        if (clickListener != null) {
324          clickListener.onClick(gridX, gridY, ship);
325        }
326      } else if (longClickListener != null && ship != null) {
327        longClickListener.onLongClick(gridX, gridY, event.getX(), event.getY(), ship);
328      }
329
330      handled = true;
331    }
332    return handled;
333  }
334
335  /**
336   * A nested Interface used to set the click listener for toggling shot placement.
337   */
338  public interface OnClickListener {
339
340    void onClick(int gridX, int gridY, Ship ship);
341  }
342
343  /**
344   * A nested interface used to set the long click listener used to invoke pop-up menu used to move
345   * ships during ship placement.
346   */
347  public interface OnLongClickListener {
348
349    void onLongClick(int gridX, int gridY, float viewX, float viewY, Ship ship);
350  }
351}
